start.title: Settings
start.body: Select the number of moles you want to play with, the speed and the time of the game.
start.note: Note: the higher the chosen speed, the more points you earn.

body.perfect: Awesome! You can share your score to show everyone how good you are!
body.good: Great! Play again to improve your reaction!
body.bad: Well... Your mouse seems to have some kind of problem, doesn't it? Don't worry, you can play again and nothing has happened here.
